p:
Water and ethanolic extracts of Youngia japonica showed no activity against HSV-1 (strain 15577) in a study conducted by Ooi et al.
190 Conversely, Kuo et al.
130 found an ethanolic extract of Nelumbo nucifera at a dose of 100 μg/ml inhibited 100% HSV-1 plaque formation in HeLa cells. The extract’s IC 50 value was determined to be 50.0 μg/ml.
